name: I have to do it... Do i?
name_original: I have to do it... Do i?
description:
Short game about a young student who has to learn for the exam tomorrow, everything depends on this exam so he has to stay awake and learn despite the thunderstorm and the fear of darkness and the unknown. You have to finish learning before 8 AM... but have you learned enough? 

controls:

W,A,S,D - movement

Left mouse button - Interact

Space bar - light source
